snippet.title: NIUM Gameplay (No commentary)
snippet.description:
I couldn't find any gameplay on Youtube, so here's some footage of the first couple of minutes.

nium is a game developed by moppin (of Downwell fame), along with Nemk, ilkae and Joonas Turner, created for the 2016 Fantastic Arcade indie game festival. It's very short and linear, but gorgeous to look at and fun to play. 

You can get it in the Juegos Rancheros Fantastic Arcade 2016 bundle along with ALPHABET, Inspector Woof, F2OGGY, and l a s s o s. 

https://juegosrancheros.itch.io/fantastic-arcade-2016
